category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 29 (Information and Statistics Committee)
contents: Article 29 (Information and Statistics Committee) The Information and Statistics Committee shall respond to the chairman's advice on the following matters. 1. Matters pertaining to the direction of implementation for sports information and statistics operation and management 2. Matters pertaining to the establishment and promotion of sports information and statistics operation and management plans, etc. 3. Other matters considered to be in accordance with the functions of the Information and Statistics Committee and submitted by the Chairman. [This article was newly established on July 5, 2023]
